onyomiExamples.meaning: wisdom, wit, sagacity, sense, intelligence, prajna (insight leading to enlightenment)
being familiar with, having a thorough knowledge of, being well-informed about

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be aware of, to know, to be conscious of, to cognize, to cognise, to notice, to feel, to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to remember, to be acquainted with (a procedure), to experience, to go through, to learn, to be acquainted with (a person), to get to know, to concern
I am content with what I am (have), Rich is the person who is content with what he is
to notify, to advise, to inform
